oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A. Schwab Store with Crowd
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black-and-white image of A. Schwab store with large crowd, many “Sale” signs, in front; Piggly Wiggly store visible to the left side.

“A. Schwab -- Established 1876 -- 163 Beale St. Memphis -- June 1922 -- A. Schwab, a department store – Since its founding in 1876, the store has been owned and operated by the Schwab family. A. Schwab is the oldest family owned general store in the Mid-South.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: A. Schwab; Beale Street; museums; stores; general stores; Beale Street businesses;
